ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 327
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I collected a stack of these last week to try with my catapult. Just have to find a troll or barbarian I can trust... What I suspect I will find out is
ygData.messageBody:
> Message: 5
> Date: Thu, 16 Nov 2000 00:48:59 -0600
> From: <jcs0001@...>
> Subject: Catapult
>
> Had a quick Q.
>
> has anyone tried using those insanely large boulders
> that drop in Perma?
>
> I know they are only useable for large races, but
> they supposedly so 200dam
>
> and if you had a tinker's bag full of them.....


I collected a stack of these last week to try with my
catapult. Just have to find a troll or barbarian I can
trust...
What I suspect I will find out is this: Throwing
boulders will go into the ammo slot, as it should, and
the catapult will go into 2nd melee slot, as it uses.
Throwing boulders will be the same, though. With or
without the catapult.

Piip Ignatz
